author: veithen
msg: Remove the Ohloh widgets because that feature causes a dependency cycle that blocks the release. The reason is that axiom-buildutils is required by the root POM, but since it is also the parent POM, it must be built before axiom-buildutils. Note that this problem didn't occur in previous releases because the root POM was not the parent POM.

msg: - do not allow implicit actions for action-only rules
